General.Name: Alfa Holdings S.A
General.Description: Alfa Holdings S.A. provides direct and indirect financial products in Brazil. It also engages in the insurance business, as well as offers technology services. The company was formerly known as Real S.A. and changed its name to Alfa Holdings S.A. in April 1999. The company was incorporated in 1959 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil. Alfa Holdings S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Administradora Fortaleza Ltda.
